item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Syrian rebels seize Damascus and topple Assad dynasty
2. Abu Mohammad al-Jolani, the Syrian rebel leader who overthrew the Assad regime
3. Trump swoops into Paris as Europe prepares for a more transactional relationship
4. Syrian rebels push towards Damascus as Assad’s grip on power wanes
5. What is next for Syria after Assad’s fall?
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
